body_html: I would expect to see code size considerations taken in generation of kernel code from LLVM IR. The instuction memory for individual cores in Knureon is quite small, and it looks like XLA could JIT kernel code that would overrun program memory. Is there a mechanism to break up a block of IR into smaller pieces?
